name: Sapphire & Shiny Kidnap the Crows
description:
Sapphire & Shiny Kidnap the Crows is a Halloween-Themed ROM Hack of Ruby & Rusty Save the Crows. Everything has been reversed. Now the main characters are evil - and your job is to help them! 

If you bought a physical or digital copy of Ruby & Rusty Save the Crows, this game is free! If you buy a copy of this game, a digital copy or Ruby & Rusty Save the Crows is free. If you want one of the free copies, just let me know.

Special thanks to The Kitchen for recording the trailer song

Hot the Cat for asking me “What would the evil versions of Ruby & Rusty be?” 

And to Spork for coming up with so many of the ideas for this game!
